Ingredients: Puris, Boiled Potatoes, Chopped Onions, Tomato, Sev, Chat Masala, Tamarind Chutney, Green Chutney
Procedure: Arrange puris on a serving plate. Make a hole in the center of each puri. Fill the puris with a mixture of boiled potatoes, chopped onions, and tomatoes. Drizzle tamarind chutney and green chutney over the puris. Sprinkle chaat masala and salt to taste. Garnish with chopped cilantro and sev. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Basmati rice, Mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, beans), Onions, Tomatoes, Ginger-garlic paste, Biryani masala, Mint leaves, Coriander leaves, Ghee, Cashews, Raisins
Procedure: Cook rice and vegetables separately. Sauté onions, add tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste, biryani masala, and mix with cooked rice and vegetables. Garnish with mint leaves, coriander leaves, and fried cashews and raisins.

Ingredients: Paneer cubes, Yogurt, Ginger-garlic paste, Red chili powder, Garam masala, Lemon juice, Salt, Onion slices, Bell pepper slices
Procedure: Marinate paneer cubes in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, garam masala, lemon juice, and salt. Skewer paneer, onion slices, and bell pepper slices. Grill until paneer is golden. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken pieces, Onions, Tomatoes, Ginger-garlic paste, Red chili powder, Turmeric powder, Garam masala, Coriander leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Sauté onions, add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, red chili powder, turmeric powder, and garam masala. Add chicken pieces, cook until done. Garnish with coriander leaves. Serve with rice or naan.

Ingredients: All-purpose flour, Cocoa powder, Sugar, Baking powder, Baking soda, Eggs, Milk, Oil, Vanilla extract
Procedure: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Mix well. Bake in a preheated oven. Let it cool. Frost with chocolate icing if desired

Ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Onion, Garlic, Tomato sauce, Red wine, Olive oil, Oregano, Basil, Salt, Parmesan cheese
Procedure: Cook spaghetti. Sauté ground beef, onions, and garlic. Add tomato sauce, red wine, olive oil, oregano, basil, and salt. Simmer. Serve over cooked spaghetti. Garnish with Parmesan cheese.

Ingredients: Mango, Red bell pepper, Red onion, Jalapeno, Lime juice, Cilantro, Salt
Procedure: Dice mango, red bell pepper, red onion, and jalapeno. Mix with lime juice, cilantro, and salt. Chill before serving. Enjoy with tortilla chips.

Ingredients: Chicken breasts, Spinach, Feta cheese, Garlic, Olive oil, Lemon juice, Salt, Peppe
Procedure: Butterfly chicken breasts. Mix spinach, feta, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Stuff into chicken. Bake until chicken is cooked through. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Tomatoes, Mozzarella cheese, Fresh basil leaves, Balsamic glaze, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange on a plate with fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Serve as a refreshing salad.

Ingredients: Shrimp, Linguine, Garlic, Butter, Olive oil, White wine, Lemon juice, Parsley, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Cook linguine. Sauté shrimp and garlic in butter and olive oil. Add white wine, lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper. Toss with cooked linguine. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Chicken, Butter, Tomato Puree, Cream, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Cashew Paste, Garam Masala, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, garlic, and spices. Cook chicken in butter. Prepare a sauce with tomato puree, cream, onion, garlic, ginger, and cashew paste. Add cooked chicken to the sauce. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Lemon Juice, Ginger-Garlic Paste, Garam Masala, Tomato Puree, Cream, Onion, Butter, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, and spices. Grill until cooked. Prepare a sauce with tomato puree, cream, onion, and spices. Add cooked chicken to the sauce. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with rice or naan.

Ingredients: Paneer, Spinach, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Cream, Butter, Salt
Procedure: Blanch spinach and blend with tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili. Cook the mixture with spices. Add paneer and cream. Simmer until flavors combine. Serve hot with roti or rice.

Ingredients: Chickpeas, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Cumin Powder, Coriander Powder, Turmeric Powder, Amchur, Kasuri Methi, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Cook chickpeas until soft. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add cooked chickpeas to the masala. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with bhature or rice.

Ingredients: Kidney Beans, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Cumin Powder, Coriander Powder, Turmeric Powder, Cream, Butter, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Soak kidney beans overnight and cook until soft. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add cooked kidney beans to the masala. Garnish with cream and kasuri methi. Serve hot with rice.

Ingredients: Potato, Cauliflower, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Turmeric Powder, Cumin Powder, Coriander Powder, Kasuri Methi, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Sauté potato and cauliflower until lightly browned. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add sautéed vegetables to the masala. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with roti or rice.

Ingredients: Eggplant, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Kasuri Methi, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Roast eggplant until soft and charred. Mash the roasted eggplant flesh. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, garlic, ginger, and spices. Add mashed eggplant to the masala. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with roti or rice.

Ingredients: Black Lentils, Kidney Beans, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Cream, Butter, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Cook black lentils and kidney beans until soft. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add cooked lentils and beans to the masala. Simmer until flavors combine. Garnish with cream and kasuri methi. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Ingredients: Paneer, Peas, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Cream, Butter, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add peas and paneer to the masala. Simmer until flavors combine. Garnish with cream and kasuri methi. Serve hot with roti or rice.

Ingredients: Paneer, Potato, Cashews, Raisins, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Cream, Butter, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Prepare kofta balls with paneer, potato, cashews, and raisins. Fry until golden brown. Prepare a creamy sauce with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add fried kofta balls to the sauce. Garnish with cream and kasuri methi. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Ingredients: Mixed Vegetables (Carrots, Peas, Beans, Potatoes), Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Cashews, Cream, Butter, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Sauté mixed vegetables until tender. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and cashews. Add sautéed vegetables to the masala. Garnish with cream and kasuri methi. Serve hot with roti or rice.

Ingredients: Paneer, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Cashews, Cream, Butter, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, and cashews. Add paneer to the masala. Simmer until flavors combine. Garnish with cream and kasuri methi. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Lemon Juice, Ginger-Garlic Paste, Garam Masala, Red Chili Powder, Turmeric Powder, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, and spices. Grill until cooked. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with mint chutney and naan.

Ingredients: Lamb, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Red Chili Powder, Kasuri Methi, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Sauté lamb until lightly browned. Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, yogurt, and spices. Add sautéed lamb to the masala. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with rice or naan.

Ingredients: Chicken, Basmati Rice, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Biryani Masala, Mint Leaves, Coriander Leaves, Ghee, Oil, Cashews, Raisins, Salt
Procedure: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, garlic, and spices. Cook rice separately. Sauté onions, add tomatoes and spices. Layer cooked rice and chicken in a pot. Garnish with fried cashews and raisins. Cook until flavors meld. Serve hot with raita.

Ingredients: Mixed Vegetables (Carrots, Peas, Beans, Potatoes), Basmati Rice, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Biryani Masala, Mint Leaves, Coriander Leaves, Ghee, Oil, Cashews, Raisins, Salt
Procedure: Cook rice and mixed vegetables separately. Sauté onions, add tomatoes and spices. Layer cooked rice and vegetables in a pot. Garnish with fried cashews and raisins. Cook until flavors meld. Serve hot with raita.

Ingredients: Chicken, Basmati Rice, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Biryani Masala, Mint Leaves, Coriander Leaves, Ghee, Oil, Cashews, Raisins, Saffron, Milk, Salt
Procedure: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, garlic, and spices. Cook rice partially. Sauté onions, add tomatoes and spices. Layer partially cooked rice and chicken in a pot. Top with fried onions, cashews, and raisins. Seal and cook on dum until flavors meld. Serve hot with raita.

Ingredients: Paneer, Tomato, Onion, Cashews, Cream, Butter, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric Powder, Kasuri Methi, Salt
Procedure: Prepare a masala with tomato, onion, and cashews. Add paneer and cream. Simmer until flavors combine. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Ingredients: Whole Wheat Flour, Potato, Green Chili, Ginger, Coriander Leaves, Garam Masala, Cumin Powder, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Knead dough with flour, oil, and salt. Prepare a stuffing with mashed potato, green chili, ginger, coriander leaves, and spices. Roll out dough, place stuffing, and seal. Cook on a griddle with oil until golden brown. Serve hot with yogurt or pickle.

Ingredients: Whole Wheat Flour, Potato, Onion, Tomato, Green Chili, Ginger, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Mustard Seeds, Turmeric Powder, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Knead dough with flour, oil, and salt. Roll out dough into circles and deep fry until puffed and golden brown. Sauté onions, add potatoes and spices. Serve hot with puris.

Ingredients: Potato, Cauliflower, Peas, Capsicum, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Pav Bhaji Masala, Butter, Lemon, Coriander Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Pressure cook vegetables until soft. Sauté onions, add tomatoes, and spices. Mash cooked vegetables and add to the masala. Cook until flavors meld. Serve hot with buttered pav, lemon wedges, and chopped onions.

Ingredients: All-purpose Flour, Potato, Peas, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Cumin Seeds, Coriander Seeds, Fennel Seeds, Garam Masala, Amchur, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Prepare dough with flour, oil, and salt. Prepare a stuffing with mashed potato, peas, and spices. Shape dough into cones, fill with stuffing, and seal. Deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

Ingredients: Gram Flour, Potato, Onion, Spinach, Cauliflower, Chili, Coriander Leaves, Cumin Seeds, Carom Seeds, Turmeric Powder, Red Chili Powder, Baking Soda, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Prepare a batter with gram flour, spices, and water. Dip sliced vegetables in batter and deep fry until crispy and golden brown. Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

Ingredients: Red Lentils, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Cumin Seeds, Mustard Seeds, Turmeric Powder, Garam Masala, Coriander Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Pressure cook lentils until soft. Prepare a tadka with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add cooked lentils and simmer until flavors meld. Garnish with coriander leaves. Serve hot with rice or roti.

Ingredients: Chicken, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Turmeric Powder, Red Chili Powder, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Kasuri Methi, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Sauté onions, add tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add chicken and yogurt. Cook until chicken is tender. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with rice or naan.

Ingredients: Fish, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Tamarind Paste, Coconut Milk, Turmeric Powder, Red Chili Powder, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Sauté onions, add tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add fish pieces, tamarind paste, and coconut milk. Simmer until fish is cooked. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Serve hot with rice.

Ingredients: Okra, Tomato, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chili, Turmeric Powder, Red Chili Powder, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Amchur, Kasuri Methi, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Sauté okra until lightly browned. Sauté onions, add tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and spices. Add sautéed okra and cook until tender. Garnish with kasuri methi. Serve hot with roti or rice.

Ingredients: Gram Flour, Semolina, Yogurt, Ginger, Green Chili, Lemon Juice, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves, Eno Fruit Salt, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Mix gram flour, semolina, yogurt, ginger, green chili, lemon juice, and salt to make a batter. Add eno fruit salt, steam until cooked. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Serve hot with chutney.

Ingredients: Idli Batter, Toor Dal, Tomato, Onion, Drumstick, Carrot, Potato, Tamarind, Sambar Powder, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Dry Red Chili, Curry Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Cook toor dal until soft. Prepare sambar with vegetables, tamarind, and spices. Serve hot with steamed idlis.

Ingredients: Rice, Urad Dal, Fenugreek Seeds, Potato, Onion, Green Chili, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Turmeric Powder, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. Grind into a batter, ferment overnight. Prepare a filling with mashed potato and spices. Spread batter on a hot griddle, add filling, fold, and cook until crisp. Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

Ingredients: Urad Dal, Green Chili, Ginger, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Asafoetida, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Soak urad dal, grind into a batter. Add green chili, ginger, curry leaves, and salt. Shape into vadas and deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney or sambar.

Ingredients: Tomato, Tamarind, Garlic, Cumin Seeds, Pepper, Coriander Seeds, Turmeric Powder, Mustard Seeds, Dry Red Chili, Curry Leaves, Asafoetida, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Cook tomatoes, tamarind, and spices in water. Temper with mustard seeds, dry red chili, and curry leaves. Serve hot as a soup or with rice.

Ingredients: Rice, Tamarind, Peanuts, Sesame Seeds, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Fenugreek Seeds, Dry Red Chili, Turmeric Powder, Jaggery, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Cook rice, spread on a plate to cool. Prepare a paste with tamarind, peanuts, sesame seeds, and spices. Sauté paste with tempering and mix with cooked rice. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Besan, Sugar, Ghee
Procedure: Mix besan and sugar. Cook with ghee until golden brown. Set in a tray, cut into pieces when cool. Serve as a sweet delicacy.

Ingredients: Carrot, Milk, Sugar, Ghee, Cashews, Raisins, Cardamom Powder
Procedure: Grate carrots, cook in milk until soft. Add sugar, ghee, and cook until thickened. Garnish with cashews, raisins, and cardamom powder. Serve hot or cold.

Ingredients: Chana Dal, Jaggery, Wheat Flour, Cardamom Powder, Nutmeg Powder, Ghee, Oil
Procedure: Cook chana dal until soft, mix with jaggery and spices. Prepare dough with wheat flour. Roll out dough, place filling, and seal. Cook on a griddle with ghee until golden brown. Serve hot with ghee.

Ingredients: Milk Powder, All-purpose Flour, Baking Powder, Ghee, Milk, Sugar, Water, Cardamom Pods
Procedure: Mix milk powder, flour, and baking powder. Add milk and ghee, knead into a dough. Shape into balls, deep fry until golden brown. Make sugar syrup, add cardamom. Soak fried balls in syrup. Serve hot or cold.

Ingredients: Semolina, Sugar, Ghee, Water, Cashews, Raisins, Cardamom Powder, Saffron
Procedure: Roast semolina in ghee. Boil water, add sugar, saffron, and roasted semolina. Cook until thickened. Garnish with cashews, raisins, and cardamom powder. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Milk, Lemon Juice, Sugar, Water, Rose Water
Procedure: Boil milk, add lemon juice to curdle. Strain and wash curdled milk. Knead into balls, boil in sugar syrup. Cook until doubled in size. Soak in rose water syrup. Serve chilled.

Ingredients: Coconut, Condensed Milk, Cardamom Powder, Ghee
Procedure: Mix grated coconut, condensed milk, and cardamom powder. Cook in ghee until mixture thickens. Shape into balls, cool. Serve as a sweet treat.

Ingredients: Rice, Milk, Sugar, Cardamom Pods, Saffron, Cashews, Raisins
Procedure: Boil rice in milk until soft and thickened. Add sugar, cardamom, saffron, cashews, and raisins. Cook until flavors meld. Serve hot or cold.

Ingredients: Flattened Rice, Onion, Potato, Peanut, Green Chili, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Turmeric Powder, Lemon Juice, Coriander Leaves, Oil
Procedure: Wash poha and drain excess water. Sauté onions, add potatoes and spices. Add soaked poha, cook until heated through. Garnish with lemon juice and coriander leaves. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Semolina, Onion, Carrot, Green Peas, Ginger, Green Chili, Mustard Seeds, Urad Dal, Chana Dal, Curry Leaves, Cashews, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Roast semolina until golden brown. Sauté onions, add vegetables and spices. Add roasted semolina and water, cook until soft. Garnish with cashews. Serve hot with chutney.

Ingredients: Urad Dal, Yogurt, Green Chili, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Asafoetida, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Soak urad dal, grind into a batter. Shape into vadas, deep fry until golden brown. Soak in water, squeeze out excess water. Pour yogurt over vadas, garnish with spices. Serve chilled.

Ingredients: Jowar Flour, Water, Salt
Procedure: Knead flour with water and salt. Roll out dough into circles, cook on a griddle until brown spots appear. Serve hot with curries or chutney.

Ingredients: Matki (Moth Beans), Onion, Tomato, Ginger-Garlic Paste, Green Chili, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Asafoetida, Garam Masala, Pav, Lemon Wedges, Coriander Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Cook matki until soft. Sauté onions, add ginger-garlic paste and spices. Add cooked matki and water, simmer until flavors meld. Serve hot with pav, lemon wedges, and chopped onions

Ingredients: Potato, Green Chili, Ginger, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves, Turmeric Powder, Coriander Leaves, Lemon Juice, Gram Flour, Baking Soda, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Boil and mash potatoes, add spices. Shape into balls, dip in batter, and deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney or pav.

Ingredients: Sago, Potato, Peanut, Green Chili, Cumin Seeds, Curry Leaves, Lemon Juice, Coriander Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Soak sago, drain excess water. Sauté potatoes, add soaked sago and spices. Cook until translucent. Garnish with lemon juice and coriander leaves. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Puffed Rice, Onion, Potato, Tomato, Green Chili, Tamarind Chutney, Green Chutney, Sev, Coriander Leaves, Lemon Juice, Salt
Procedure: Mix puffed rice, onions, potatoes, tomatoes, and spices. Add chutneys, sev, and lemon juice. Toss well and serve immediately.

Ingredients: Papdi, Potato, Chickpeas, Onion, Tomato, Green Chili, Tamarind Chutney, Green Chutney, Yogurt, Sev, Coriander Leaves, Chaat Masala, Salt
Procedure: Arrange papdis on a plate. Top with potatoes, chickpeas, onions, tomatoes, chutneys, and yogurt. Sprinkle with sev, chaat masala, and salt. Serve immediately.

Ingredients: Potato, White Peas, Onion, Tomato, Green Chili, Ginger, Garlic, Tamarind Chutney, Green Chutney, Sev, Coriander Leaves, Oil, Salt
Procedure: Boil and mash potatoes, shape into patties, and shallow fry until golden brown. Cook white peas until soft. Prepare a masala with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Serve patties topped with ragda, chutneys, sev, and coriander leaves.

Ingredients: Cabbage, coconut, mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chilies, turmeric powder, salt, oil.
Procedure: Sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chilies in oil. Add cabbage, turmeric, salt, and coconut. Cook until cabbage is tender.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, green chilies, coriander leaves, cumin, turmeric, salt, oil.
Procedure: Roast brinjal, peel and mash. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. Add mashed brinjal, tomatoes, and cook until flavors blend.

Ingredients: Cabbage, gram flour, rice flour, chili powder, turmeric, salt, oil.
Procedure: Mix shredded cabbage with gram flour, rice flour, spices. Make a batter, deep fry until golden brown.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), tamarind, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, coriander seeds, red chilies, mustard seeds, curry leaves, oil.
Procedure: Stuff brinjals with a paste of spices. Cook in tamarind gravy with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

Ingredients: Cabbage, grated coconut, mustard seeds, urad dal, green chilies, curry leaves, turmeric, salt, oil.
Procedure: Sauté mustard seeds, urad dal, green chilies, curry leaves. Add cabbage, turmeric, salt, and coconut. Cook until tender.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, green chilies, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt, oil.
Procedure: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, green chilies. Add tomatoes, spices, and brinjal. Cook until brinjal is soft.

Ingredients: Cabbage, potatoes, gram flour, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, green chilies, coriander leaves, cumin seeds, turmeric, garam masala, salt, oil.
Procedure: Make koftas with cabbage, potatoes, and gram flour. Fry and add to a curry made with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), peanuts, sesame seeds, coconut, onions, tomatoes, tamarind, garlic, ginger, red chilies, cumin, coriander, turmeric, garam masala, salt, oil.
Procedure: Roast and grind spices with peanuts, sesame seeds, coconut. Cook brinjals with onions, tomatoes, tamarind, and the ground paste.

Ingredients: Cabbage, carrots, onions, garlic, ginger, vegetable broth, bay leaves, thyme, salt, pepper, oil.
Procedure: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger. Add cabbage, carrots, vegetable broth, and spices. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), besan (gram flour), rice flour, chili powder, turmeric, salt, oil.
Procedure: Mix brinjal slices with besan, rice flour, spices. Deep fry until crispy.

Ingredients: Cabbage, whole wheat flour, onions, green chilies, coriander leaves, cumin seeds, turmeric, salt, oil.
Procedure: Mix shredded cabbage with wheat flour, onions, spices. Make dough, roll into parathas, and cook with oil.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), tamarind, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, sambar powder, mustard seeds, curry leaves, fenugreek seeds, oil.
Procedure: Cook brinjals in tamarind gravy with onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, and spices.

Ingredients: Cabbage, corn flour, all-purpose flour, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, green onions, salt, oil.
Procedure: Make balls with shredded cabbage and flours. Fry and toss with sauces, ginger-garlic paste, and green onions.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), peanuts, sesame seeds, coconut, onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric, garam masala, salt, oil.
Procedure: Stuff brinjals with a mixture of spices, coconut, and peanuts. Cook in a gravy made with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

Ingredients: Cabbage, toor dal, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, green chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds, turmeric, coriander leaves, salt, oil.
Procedure: Cook toor dal with cabbage, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, and spices. Tempered with mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and garnished with coriander leaves.

Ingredients: Brinjal (eggplant), rice, tamarind, onions, tomatoes, peanuts, chana dal, urad dal, mustard seeds, curry leaves, red chilies, coriander leaves, turmeric, salt, oil.
Procedure: Cook rice with a mixture of brinjals, tamarind, onions, tomatoes, peanuts, and spices.

Ingredients: Capsicum, potatoes, onions, tomatoes, peas, ginger, garlic, turmeric, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, salt, oil.
Procedure: Stuff capsicum with a mixture of mashed potatoes, peas, onions, tomatoes, and spices. Bake until capsicum is tender.

Ingredients: Cabbage leaves, rice, carrots, capsicum, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, chili flakes, cumin powder, coriander leaves, salt, oil.
Procedure: Blanch cabbage leaves, fill with a mixture of rice, carrots, capsicum, onions, tomatoes, and spices. Roll and bake until cooked.

Ingredients: Tomatoes, rice, onions, capsicum, ginger, garlic, green chilies, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, turmeric, coriander leaves, salt, oil.
Procedure: Sauté onions, ginger, garlic, green chilies, and spices. Add tomatoes, capsicum, rice, and cook until rice is done.

Ingredients: Capsicum, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Brinjal, Pasta, Olive Oil, Basil, Oregano, Chili Flakes, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Sauté onions, garlic. Add capsicum, tomatoes, brinjal, herbs, spices. Toss with cooked pasta.

Ingredients: Brinjal, Capsicum, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Tomato, Soy Sauce, Vinegar, Chili Flakes, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger. Add brinjal, capsicum, tomatoes, soy sauce. Stir-fry until cooked.

Ingredients: Capsicum, Brinjal, Tomato, Onion, Cucumber, Lettuce, Lemon Juice, Olive Oil, Salt, Pepper, Herbs
Procedure: Grill vegetables. Mix with lettuce, dress with lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper, herbs.

Ingredients: Capsicum, Cheese, Tomato, Onion, Bread Slices, Butter, Salt, Pepper, Mixed Herbs
Procedure: Layer capsicum, cheese, tomato, and onion between bread slices. Grill until cheese melts.

Ingredients: Rice, Capsicum, Cabbage, Brinjal, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Soy Sauce, Vinegar, Chili Flakes, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Cook rice, stir-fry with chopped vegetables, soy sauce, vinegar, and spices.

Ingredients: Rice, Cabbage, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Green Chilies, Cumin Seeds, Bay Leaves, Cardamom, Cinnamon, Cloves, Turmeric, Coriander Leaves, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. Add cabbage, tomatoes, rice, and cook until rice is done.

Ingredients: Rice, Brinjal, Coconut, Tomato, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Green Chilies, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Turmeric, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. Add brinjal, coconut, cooked rice, and mix well.

Ingredients: Gram Flour (Besan), Semolina (Rava), Yogurt, Green Chilies, Ginger, Turmeric, Lemon Juice, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves, Fresh Coriander Leaves, Salt, Sugar, Baking Soda, Oil
Procedure: Prepare a batter with gram flour, semolina, yogurt, green chilies, ginger, turmeric, salt, and sugar. Ferment, steam, and temper with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and lemon juice.

Ingredients: Potatoes, Sweet Potatoes, Brinjal, Green Beans, Peas, Banana, Surati Papdi, Fresh Coconut, Ginger, Garlic, Green Chilies, Cilantro, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric, Garam Masala, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Mix vegetables with spices. Cook with fresh coconut and temper with garlic, ginger, and green chilies.

Ingredients: Yogurt, Gram Flour (Besan), Ginger, Green Chilies, Curry Leaves, Mustard Seeds, Cumin Seeds, Fenugreek Seeds, Asafoetida (Hing), Turmeric, Jaggery, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Prepare a mixture of yogurt, gram flour, ginger, green chilies, and spices. Cook until thickened and temper with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and asafoetida.

Ingredients: Whole Wheat Flour, Fenugreek Leaves (Methi), Yogurt, Green Chilies, Ginger, Turmeric, Cumin Seeds, Coriander Leaves, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Knead dough with wheat flour, fenugreek leaves, yogurt, green chilies, ginger, turmeric, and spices. Roll out, cook on a griddle with oil.

Ingredients: Gram Flour (Besan), Yogurt, Ginger, Green Chilies, Turmeric, Mustard Seeds, Asafoetida (Hing), Curry Leaves, Fresh Coriander Leaves, Grated Coconut, Oil
Procedure: Cook gram flour and yogurt mixture until thickened, spread thin layers, roll, and cut. Temper with mustard seeds, asafoetida, and curry leaves.

Ingredients: Rice, Lentils (Tuvar Dal), Yogurt, Bottle Gourd (Lauki), Fenugreek Leaves (Methi), Green Chilies, Ginger, Turmeric, Mustard Seeds, Sesame Seeds, Asafoetida (Hing), Baking Soda, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Soak rice and lentils, blend with yogurt, ferment, mix with grated bottle gourd, fenugreek leaves, and spices. Bake until cooked.

Ingredients: Fish Fillets, Flour Tortillas, Cabbage, Tomato, Onion, Avocado, Lime Juice, Cilantro, Garlic, Cumin, Chili Powder, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Grill fish fillets, assemble tacos with shredded cabbage, diced tomatoes, onions, avocado, lime juice, and cilantro.

Ingredients: Pork Ribs, Barbecue Sauce, Brown Sugar, Paprika, Garlic Powder, Onion Powder, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Rub pork ribs with a mixture of brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Bake or grill until tender, basting with barbecue sauce.

Ingredients: Ground Beef, Onion, Garlic, Ginger, Cilantro, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Paprika, Chili Powder, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Mix ground beef with finely chopped onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. Shape into kebabs and grill until cooked.

Ingredients: Lamb, Basmati Rice, Onion, Tomato, Garlic, Ginger, Yogurt, Garam Masala, Coriander Powder, Cumin Powder, Turmeric, Saffron, Bay Leaves, Mint Leaves, Salt, Oil
Procedure: Marinate lamb in yogurt and spices. Layer with partially cooked rice, saffron, and mint leaves. Cook until rice and lamb are done.

Ingredients: Chicken Wings, Hot Sauce, Butter, Garlic Powder, Onion Powder, Paprika, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Marinate chicken wings in hot sauce, butter, and spices. Bake or fry until crispy.

Ingredients: Salmon Fillets, Lemon Juice, Olive Oil, Garlic, Dill, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Marinate salmon fillets in lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, chopped dill, salt, and pepper. Grill until cooked through.

Ingredients: Ham, Honey, Brown Sugar, Dijon Mustard, Apple Cider Vinegar, Cloves, Salt, Pepper
Procedure: Mix honey, brown sugar, Dijon mustard, apple cider vinegar, cloves, salt, and pepper. Brush over ham and bake until caramelized.
